channel.title: polarize.ai
channel.description: A personal blog about smart IoT now - a top secret, world changing, machine learning stealth project to be incubated later given resources.

item.title: Running Kubernetes and TensorFlow on NVIDIA Jetson edge devices - part 2/5
item.description:
This article will be published early September 2019.

item.title: Running Kubernetes and TensorFlow on NVIDIA Jetson edge devices - part 1/5
item.description:
This article will be published end of August 2019.

“I could either watch it happen or be a part of it.” Elon Musk
